content:
published by american thread company in *suggestions for fairs and bazaars* star book no 98 in 1953 calls for either the famous puritan crochet cotton article 40 or de luxe quality crochet cotton article 346 any size 10 crochet thread can be substituted
**materials ** * 1 ball shaded nile greens * 1 ball lt yellow or buttercup * steel crochet hook no 7 no gauge is specified
